thread.title: Alleged rape victim had consensual sex with model boss
thread.title_full: Alleged rape victim had consensual sex with model boss | News24

author: news24.com
title: Alleged rape victim had consensual sex with model boss
text:
Johannesburg - A 20-year-old woman who alleges that former modelling boss Dawie de Villiers raped her when she was a teenager has told the court that the two had a sexual relationship prior to the incident, the High Court sitting in Palm Ridge heard on Wednesday.
"Dawie and I had a sexual relationship before he raped me," the woman told the court.
Earlier, when cross-examined by De Villiers's lawyer, Jaques Pienaar, she had said she was a virgin before the rape occurred.
"Why didn't you tell us this earlier?" Pienaar asked the woman.
